page.title: 12JOB QUESTIONAIRE 2
page.content: SERVICE/MANUFACTUING 13 people worked in the manufacturing/ building sector and 41 in the service sector. FULL/PART TIME EMPLOYMENT 22 worked fulltime and 32 were in part time work. TRAVEL TO WORK 5 walked to work; 3 travelled by rail; 35 by road <34 in cars>;11 worked from home. TRAVEL TO WORK TIME Of those who travel to work 21 took upto 15 mins.; 15 took between 16 and 30 mins.; 5 took between 30 and 45 mins. PRESENT EMPLOYMENT 22 had been in their current job less upto 5 years; 6 between 6 and 10 years; 21 between 11 and 20 years; 5 over 20 years.
